parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the EPAS system can cause the steering wheel to lock up, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: making it difficult or impossible to turn
the vehicle pulls to one side
the steering wheel requires excessive force to turn
the dashboard displays an "Electronic Power Assisted Steering Failure" warning message.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the rack and pinion system can cause the vehicle to pull to one side, making it difficult to steer, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle pulls to one side
the steering wheel feels loose or difficult to turn
the steering wheel requires excessive force to turn
the vehicle is difficult to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the turbocharger oil lines can cause a massive oil leak, leading to engine damage, smoke emission, and potential fire hazards, which can compromise vehicle safety and performance.
Unintended acceleration can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries, posing a significant risk to the driver and other road users.
A cracked coolant tank can lead to coolant leakage, engine overheating, and potential fire hazards, causing damage to the engine and electrical components.
The presence of exhaust fumes in the cabin can cause discomfort, health issues, and distraction to the driver, compromising vehicle safety.
symptoms: need to roll down windows to clear the cabin.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Stalling and Loss of Acceleration
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine stalling and loss of acceleration can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries, posing a significant risk to the driver and other road users.
symptoms: airbag and service lights coming on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rearview camera can increase the risk of accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially when reversing in areas where children or pedestrians are present.
symptoms: The rearview camera image is upside down
making it difficult or impossible to see objects behind the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear suspension toe link can cause the vehicle to become extremely difficult to maneuver, leading to loss of control, which can result in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle becomes difficult to steer
the vehicle veers hard into the next lane or off the road
the vehicle is uncontrollable on bumpy roads
abnormal loud sounds coming from the rear of the vehicle
